ŠKODA Webpart Library

A single source of truth for all;

  • Designers - Design standards, Laid out building blocks
  • Front Enders - Reusable tested consistent code, Modular file structure
  • Project Managers - Quicker prototyping, Contexual discussions with clients
  • Clients - Faster build, Less resource, Content led

Atoms

Atoms are the basic building blocks of matter. Applied to web interfaces, atoms are our HTML tags, such as a form label, an input or a button.

Molecules

Molecules are groups of two or more atoms held together by chemical bonds. These combinations of atoms take on their own unique properties, and become more tangible and operational than atoms.

Webparts

Webparts are the final product from the atomic design
